concept.title: Additional Drivers
concept.shortdesc: You can install additional drivers for stages.

conbody.p: driversinstalling additional for stagesBefore you use the JMS Consumer and JDBC Consumer origins or the JDBC Producer destination, you need to install drivers for the implementation that you want to use. For example, to use the JDBC Consumer or JDBC Producer with Oracle, install the Oracle JDBC drivers.
Additional drivers for other stages are optional. For example, you can install custom classes for the JavaScript or Jython Evaluators.
